altername_name: Pokémon Mundo Misterioso: Portales al infinito
Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Gates to Infinity
Pokemon Fushigi no Dungeon: Magnagate to Mugendai Meikyuu
Pokemon Mystery Dungeon: Gates to Infinity
name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Gates to Infinity
overview: Discover the incredible 3D world of Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Gates to Infinity, where Pokémon speak and amazing adventures are always nearby! What's more, you will become a Pokémon yourself! You'll meet all kinds of Pokémon throughout the game, both in the towns you'll visit and the Mystery Dungeons you'll explore.
